chapter.text: By those (the angels) who align themselves in ranks
(Some) driving away with reproof
(And others) reciting the Reminder (revealed from God)
Most surely your Lord is One
The Lord of the heavens and the earth and all that is between them, and the Lord of all the easts
We have indeed adorned the lowest heaven (the heaven of the world) with an ornament – the stars
And for guard against every devil persistent in haughty rebellion
They cannot hear anything from the High Assembly (of the angels) – and (whenever they attempt to hear) become targets of missiles from all directions
Repelled, and for them is a perpetual punishment –
Excepting one who snatches something by stealth, and is pursued (and destroyed) by a piercing shooting-star

So ask them (the polytheists): "Are they more formidable in structure or those that We have created (the heavens and the angels in them). Indeed, We have created them (human beings) from a sticky clay
You find all God’s acts wonderful, and their denial strange, but they continue to mock (God’s Message and His Messenger)
And when they are reminded (of Divine truths and admonished by His Revelations), they pay no heed
When they see an extraordinary evidence (of the truth, a miracle), they take it in mockery (and call others to do the same)
And they say, "This is clearly nothing but sorcery
What! After we have died and become dust and bones, will we then be raised from the dead
And also our forefathers of old
Say: "Yes, indeed, and most humiliated you will be
It will be only a single scaring cry, and then behold, they are staring (in dread)
And saying: "Woe to us! This is the Day of Judgment
(And it is said): "This is the Day of Judgment and Distinction (between truth and falsehood, between the righteous and the sinful – the Day) that you used to deny

(God commands the angels:) "Gather together all those who committed the greatest wrong (by obstinately associating partners with God), and their (devilish) comrades, and all that they used to worship (of idols, and the rebellious among humankind and jinn)
Apart from God, and lead them to the path of the Blazing Flame
And arrest them there, for they must be questioned (concerning their deeds in the world)
But, what is the matter with you that you do not help one another (to escape punishment)
Instead, on that Day they will be in utter submission (without the least sign of arrogance)
And they turn to one another, exchanging words (of blame) with one another
They (the ones led) say (to the leaders): "It was you who used to come to us affecting (pretending to be our well-wishers and offering falsehood as truth)
They (the leaders) say: "No! Rather, you yourselves were not believers, (with no inclination and intention to believe)
And we had no power over you (to compel you to disbelieve). But you yourselves were a rebellious people
So our Lord’s word (of punishment) has come true against us. (In justice) we are bound to taste it
So then, (though without power to compel, if) we did mislead you (and cause you to rebel), for surely we ourselves had been lost in error
So, on that Day they will be associated together in (suffering) the punishment
That is how We will deal with the disbelieving criminals
For when they were told that there is no deity but God, they would grow arrogant and reject it
And they would say, "Are we to give up our deities for the sake of a mad poet
No! Rather he has brought (you) the truth and confirms those (Messengers) sent (before him)
You are surely bound to taste the painful punishment (on account of your attitude and actions)
And you will not be recompensed but for what you were doing
But not so God’s servants endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
For those there is (in Paradise) a provision specially prepared
Fruits (as the reward of their life in the world); and they will be highly honored
In Gardens of bounty and blessing
Sitting on thrones, face to face
A cup will be passed round among them with a drink from a pure, gushing spring
Clear, delightful for those who drink it
Free from any headiness or harm, and they will not suffer intoxication from it
And with them will be pure, chaste-eyed spouses (whose glances are fixed on them only), most beautiful of eye
(As free from any ugliness, and) untouched, as if they were hidden (ostrich) eggs
They will turn to one another, indulging in friendly talk
One of them speaks thus: "I had a close companion
Who used to ask me, ‘Are you really one of those who confirm the truth (of what the Messenger teaches us about the Last Judgment)
‘Will we, when we die and have become dust and bones – will we then really be (raised and) put under judgment?’
He (the speaker) will say: "Would you like to look (into Hell to see him)
He will look down and see him in the midst of the Blazing Flame
He will say: "By God, you would nearly have caused me to perish
Had it not been for the grace of my Lord, I would certainly have been among those arraigned (in the Flame for punishment)
(Then, turning to his companions, he will say:) "We are not to experience death any more, are we
Except the former death (that we experienced in leaving the world), and we are not to be punished
(Then) this is most certainly the supreme triumph
For the like of this, then, let those who will labor (to a goal) labor
Is this what is good as a welcome or the tree of Zaqqum
We have made it (that tree) a means of trial and punishment for the wrongdoers (who associate partners with God)
It is a tree growing in the heart of the Blazing Flame
Its fruits are like the heads of satans
So, most surely, they will eat of it and fill up their bellies with it
Then, for them will be boiling water (to mix with the zaqqum in their bodies)
And afterwards, they are bound to return to the Blazing Flame again
Assuredly they found their forefathers on the wrong path
And yet, they rush (after them) in their footsteps
Indeed, most of those (communities) that lived before them went astray
Though We had sent among them warners (with Our guidance)
So see how was the outcome for those who were warned (but paid no heed)
Except God’s servants, endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
And Noah (just such a servant and warner) had called upon Us (for help), and how excellent We are in answering (prayer)
We saved him and (his true followers among) his family and people from the mighty distress
And We caused his offspring to endure (on the earth)
And We left for him among later-comers (until the end of time this greeting and remembrance of him and his Message)
Peace be upon Noah among all beings
Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants
As for the others (who opposed him), We caused them to drown
Abraham was surely one who followed the same way as his
He had turned to his Lord with a heart sound and pure (from any trace of insincerity of faith)
(Remember) when he said to his father and his people, "What is that you worship
Is it a fabrication that you pursue, worshipping deities apart from God
So, what do you think about the Lord of the worlds (that you dare to do so)
Then (when invited to participate in the religious ceremonies of the people on a festival day) he cast a glance at the stars
And he said: "Indeed I am sick
So they (the others) turned away from him and departed
Thereupon he approached their deities, and said, "Will you not eat (of the offerings put before you)
What is the matter with you that you do not speak
Then he fell upon them, striking them with his right hand (with all his strength)
Then, the other people headed towards him hurriedly
He said: "Do you worship things that you yourselves have carved
While it is God Who has created you and all that you do
They (consulted among themselves and) said: "Build him a pyre and throw him into the blazing flames
So they intended a scheme against him (to destroy him), but We made them the ones brought low
And he said: "Now I am going to my Lord (to quit my homeland purely for His sake, in the full conviction that) He will guide me (to a land where I will be able to worship Him freely)
(And he prayed): "My Lord, Grant me (the gift of a child who will be) one of the righteous
So We gave him the glad tidings of a boy (who was to grow as one) mild and forbearing

Then, when (his son) grew alongside him to the age of striving (for the necessities of life), he said: "O my dear son! I have seen in my dream that I should offer you in sacrifice. So think about this and tell me your view!" He said (unhesitatingly): "O my dear father! Do as you are commanded. You will find me, by God’s will, one of those who show steadfast patience (in obeying God’s commands)
Then when both had submitted to God’s will, and Abraham had laid him down on the side of his forehead
(At just that moment,) We called out to him: "O Abraham

You have already fulfilled the dream (which tested your loyal obedience to the command; so you no longer have to offer your son in sacrifice.) Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Behold, all this was indeed a trial, clear
And We ransomed him with a sacrifice tremendous in worth
And We left for him among later-comers (until the end of time this greeting and remembrance of him and his Message)
Peace be upon Abraham
Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants
We gave him the glad tidings of Isaac to be a Prophet among the righteous

We showered Our blessings on both him (Ishmael) and on Isaac; and among the offspring of both there have been those devoted to doing good, aware that God is seeing them, and those who have plainly been wronging themselves (by sinning)
We assuredly bestowed Our favor also upon Moses and Aaron
And We saved them and their people from the mighty distress (of slavery and persecution)
And We helped them, so they became the victors
And We granted them both (Moses and Aaron) the clear Book (which explained the matters that had been secret, and which the people needed for the happiness of their life in both worlds)
We showed them the Straight Path (enabling them to follow it in every matter without any deviance)
And We left for them among later-comers (until the end of time, this greeting and remembrance of them and their Message)
Peace be upon Moses and Aaron
Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Surely those two were among Our truly believing servants
And surely Ilyas (Elijah) was one of the Messengers
(Remember) when he said to his people: "Will you not keep from disobedience to God in reverence for Him and piety
Will you continue to invoke Ba‘l (as deity) and forsake the Creator Who creates everything in the best and most appropriate form and has the ultimate rank of creativity –
God, your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers
But they denied him, and so they are surely bound to be arraigned (for judgment)
Except God’s servants, endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
And We left for him among later-comers (until the end of time this greeting and remembrance of him and his Message)
Peace be upon Il-Yasin
Thus do We reward those devoted to doing good as if seeing God
Surely he was one of Our truly believing servants
And surely Lot was one of the Messengers
(Remember) when We (ordered him to leave the land of sinners and) saved him and his family all together
Except an old woman among those who stayed behind
Then We annihilated the others
Indeed, you pass by them (the ruins of their dwellings) at morning-time (during your travels for trade)
And by night. Will you not, then, use your reason and take heed
And surely Jonah was one of the Messengers
(Remember) when he left like a runaway slave for a ship fully laden
And then he (agreed to) cast lots, and he was one of those who lost
(They threw him into the sea, and) the big fish swallowed him, while he was accused (by his conscience)
Had it not been that he was one who always glorified God, (declaring Him absolutely above having any defects and partners)
He would certainly have remained in its belly (serving as his grave) until the Day when all will be raised (from the dead)
But We caused him to be cast forth on a desert shore, sick as he was
And caused a gourd plant to grow over him
And We sent him once again to (his people, numbering) a hundred thousand, rather they tended to increase
And they believed in him (this time), and so, (sparing them,) We allowed them to enjoy life for a term allotted to them
So ask them, (O Messenger,) whether your Lord has daughters while sons are allotted for them
Or that We created the angels female and they were witnesses
Beware, it is surely one of their fabrications that they say
God has begotten." Most certainly they are liars
He has (made gender-discrimination and so) chosen daughters in preference to sons, has He
What is the matter with you? How can you judge so
Will you not still reflect and be mindful
Or do you have a clear authority (of evidence)
If so, produce your book (which), if you are truthful in your claim, (must have come from God)

And they have concocted a kin-relationship between Him and the jinn (to excuse their worshipping the jinn); whereas the jinn know quite well that they (are created and sustained by God and) are bound to be arraigned (before Him for judgment)
All-Glorified is He, absolutely exalted above such as they attribute to Him
But God’s servants endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion do not do so
For sure you and those that you worship
Cannot cause any to deviate concerning God
Except those who have willfully adopted the way to the Blazing Flame
(The angels whom they assert to be God’s daughters say): "There is none among us but has his duty and position assigned
And surely we are those ranged in ranks (ever-expecting God’s commands)
And most certainly we are the ones glorifying Him (declaring Him to be above having any defects and partners)
They (the polytheists) surely used to say
If only We had had a Reminder of the like those who lived before us had
Then we would certainly have been God’s servants endowed with sincerity in faith and practicing the Religion
Yet (now the Qur’an has come to them) they disbelieve in it; so they will come to know
Indeed Our word (of promise) has already gone forth in respect of Our servants sent with Our Message (of guidance and warning)
That they would surely be helped to victory
And that surely Our host (the host of the true believers), they are certainly the victors
So turn aside from them for a little while, (do not care what they do and say)
And watch them and see (to what end their denial will lead them), as they also will see it
Or do they seek to hasten on Our punishment (that it befall them immediately)
But when it descends encompassing them, then evil will be the morning of those who have been warned
And ignore what they say and do for a little while
And watch them and see (what the ultimate end of all people will be), as they also will see it
All-Glorified is your Lord, the Lord of might and glory, exalted above all that they attribute (to Him)
And peace be upon the Messengers
And all praise and gratitude are for God, the Lord of the worlds
